mapper.select:
SELECT carnumber, count( key1 ) frequency FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT carnumber, endtime, key1 FROM ( SELECT carnumber, date( date_add( endtime, INTERVAL 8 HOUR ) ) endtime, CONCAT( carnumber, ' ', date( date_add( endtime, INTERVAL 8 HOUR ) ) ) key1 FROM fullingdb.bus_tradelog WHERE
endtime >= #{queryDTO.startTime} AND
endtime <= #{queryDTO.endTime} AND
station_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationCode}, '%') AND
station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationName}, '%') AND
carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.carNumber}, '%') AND
ASCII( carnumber ) > 127 ) a ) b GROUP BY carnumber
HAVING COUNT( key1 ) >= #{queryDTO.minFrequency} AND COUNT( key1 ) <= #{queryDTO.maxFrequency}

SELECT station_code, station_name, count(distinct endtime) total_deal, SUM(case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then 1 else 0 end) is_match FROM fullingdb.bus_tradelog
AND endtime >= #{queryDTO.startTime}
AND endtime <= #{queryDTO.endTime}
AND station_area_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationAreaName}, '%')
AND station_exp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpName}, '%')
AND station_exp_service_area LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpServiceArea}, '%')
AND station_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationCode}, '%')
AND station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationName}, '%')
AND carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.carNumber}, '%')
GROUP BY station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_code, station_name

SELECT station_code, station_name, nozzleno, count(distinct endtime) total_deal, SUM(case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then 1 else 0 end) is_match FROM fullingdb.bus_tradelog
AND endtime >= #{queryDTO.startTime}
AND endtime <= #{queryDTO.endTime}
AND station_area_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationAreaName}, '%')
AND station_exp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpName}, '%')
AND station_exp_service_area LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpServiceArea}, '%')
AND station_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationCode}, '%')
AND station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationName}, '%')
AND carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.carNumber}, '%')
GROUP BY station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_code, station_name, nozzleno

SELECT left(carnumber,1) province, mid(carnumber,2,1) city, carnumber, date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) endtime, date_add(t.starttime,interval 8 hour) starttime, t.endtime, o.paytime, o.billno, o.nozzleno, o.realamount, o.volume, CONCAT(t.oilcode,t.oilclass) oilcode, t.oilclass, t.station_name, t.station_code, station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area from ( select paytime,billno,realamount,volume,station_code,nozzleno,startread,endread,max(update_time) from fullingdb.bus_orderlog
AND date_add(paytime,interval 8 hour) >= #{queryDTO.startTime}
AND date_add(paytime,interval 8 hour) <= #{queryDTO.endTime}
group by paytime,billno,realamount,volume,station_code,nozzleno,startread,endread ) o left join ( select station_code,nozzleno,startread,endread,carnumber,endtime,starttime,oilclass,oilcode,station_name,station_area_name,station_exp_name,station_exp_service_area from fullingdb.bus_tradelog where
date_add(endtime,interval 8 hour) >= #{queryDTO.startTime} AND
date_add(endtime,interval 8 hour) <= #{queryDTO.endTime} AND
ASCII(carnumber) > 127 ) t on o.station_code=t.station_code and o.nozzleno=t.nozzleno and o.startread=t.startread and o.endread=t.endread WHERE
date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) >= #{queryDTO.startTime} AND
date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) <= #{queryDTO.endTime} AND
t.station_area_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationAreaName}, '%') AND
t.station_exp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpName}, '%') AND
t.station_exp_service_area LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpServiceArea}, '%') AND
t.station_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationCode}, '%') AND
t.station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationName}, '%') AND
t.oilcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.oilCode}, '%') AND
t.carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.carNumber}, '%') AND
length(t.carnumber) > 0

SELECT
cast(date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) as date) endtime,
left(carnumber,1) province,
station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_name, station_code, count(distinct date_add(endtime,interval 8 hour)) total_deal, SUM(case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then 1 else 0 end) is_match, sum(volume) volume FROM fullingdb.bus_tradelog t
AND date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) >= #{queryDTO.startTime}
AND date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) <= #{queryDTO.endTime}
AND t.station_area_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationAreaName}, '%')
AND t.station_exp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpName}, '%')
AND t.station_exp_service_area LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpServiceArea}, '%')
AND t.station_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationCode}, '%')
AND t.station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationName}, '%')
AND t.carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.carNumber}, '%')
AND t.oilclass LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.oilClass}, '%')
AND t.oilcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.oilCode}, '%')
GROUP BY cast(date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) as date), station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_name, station_code
,cast(date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) as date) endtime
,left(carnumber,1) province
ORDER BY t.endtime

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(date_add( t.endtime, INTERVAL 0 HOUR ), '%Y') endtime,
DATE_FORMAT(date_add( t.endtime, INTERVAL 0 HOUR ), '%Y-%m') endtime,
case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then left(carnumber,1) else '-' end carnumber,
case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then CONCAT(left(carnumber,1), mid(carnumber,2,1)) else '-' end carnumber,
case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then carnumber else '-' end carnumber,
t.oilclass,
t.oilcode,
station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_name, station_code, count(distinct date_add(endtime,interval 0 hour)) total_deal, SUM(case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then 1 else 0 end) is_match, sum(volume) volume FROM fullingdb.bus_tradelog t
AND date_add(t.endtime,interval 0 hour) >= #{queryDTO.startTime}
AND date_add(t.endtime,interval 0 hour) <= #{queryDTO.endTime}
AND t.station_area_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationAreaName}, '%')
AND t.station_exp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpName}, '%')
AND t.station_exp_service_area LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpServiceArea}, '%')
AND t.station_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationCode}, '%')
AND t.station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationName}, '%')
AND t.carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.carNumber}, '%')
AND t.oilclass LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.oilClass}, '%')
AND t.oilcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.oilCode}, '%')
GROUP BY station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_name, station_code
,t.oilclass
,t.oilcode
,DATE_FORMAT(date_add( t.endtime, INTERVAL 0 HOUR ), '%Y')
,DATE_FORMAT(date_add( t.endtime, INTERVAL 0 HOUR ), '%Y-%m')
,left(carnumber,1)
,CONCAT(left(carnumber,1), mid(carnumber,2,1))
,carnumber
ORDER BY t.endtime

SELECT cast(date_add(t.endtime,interval 0 hour) as date) endtime, station_area_name,
station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area,
station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_name, station_code,
oilclass, oilcode, count(distinct date_add(endtime,interval 0 hour)) total_deal, SUM(case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then 1 else 0 end) is_match, ROUND(sum(volume), 4) volume FROM fullingdb.bus_tradelog t WHERE date_add(t.endtime,interval 0 hour) >= #{queryDTO.startTime} AND date_add(t.endtime,interval 0 hour) <= #{queryDTO.endTime}
AND t.station_area_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationAreaName}, '%')
AND t.station_exp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpName}, '%')
AND t.station_exp_service_area LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpServiceArea}, '%')
AND t.oilclass LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.oilClass}, '%')
AND t.oilcode LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.oilCode}, '%')
AND t.carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.carNumber}, '%')
GROUP BY cast(date_add(t.endtime,interval 0 hour) as date), station_area_name,
station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area,
station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_name, station_code,
oilclass,oilcode ORDER BY t.endtime

SELECT cast(date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) as date) endtime,
station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area,
station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_name, station_code,
oilclass, oilcode, count(distinct date_add(endtime,interval 8 hour)) total_deal, SUM(case when length(trim(carnumber)) > 1 then 1 else 0 end) is_match, ROUND(sum(volume), 4) volume FROM fullingdb.bus_tradelog t WHERE (date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) >= #{queryDTO.startTime} AND date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) <= #{queryDTO.endTime})
AND t.station_area_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationAreaName}, '%')
AND t.station_exp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpName}, '%')
AND t.station_exp_service_area LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.stationExpServiceArea}, '%')
AND t.carnumber LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryDTO.carNumber}, '%')
GROUP BY cast(date_add(t.endtime,interval 8 hour) as date),
station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area,
station_area_name, station_exp_name, station_exp_service_area, station_name, station_code,
oilclass,oilcode ORDER BY t.endtime
